name: Yeet That Barrel
description:
Yeet That Barrel! is a frustrating 2D platformer barrel simulation. Bounce through this intense obstacle course and attempt to barrel to the end without losing your barrel. The most important thing is that it’s not always about the destination, sometimes it’s about barrel-y getting there.

The objective of the game is to reach the green zone. This game is merely a prototype of the chaos soon to come.
